data.actual_result: Welcome text overlaps on multiple lines:
data.expected_result: The text should show up correctly and not overlap
data.short_description: Text display collision on welcome to server message after creation of a discord server with smaller client windows
data.steps_to_repro: - Resize the discord client to a smaller size (the initial bug was found with the client docked to half of a 1920x1080 screen) - Make your name atleast 10-16 characters long - Create a discord server - Check the 'welcome to your server' message.
